channel.title: Gauhati HC on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Gauhati HC on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Gauhati HC allows IFF's intervention application in petition challenging the constitutionality of internet shutdown rules #KeepItOn
item.description: At a hearing dated January 31, 2022, IFF’s intervention application challenging the Telecom Suspension Rules, 2017 has been allowed by the Gauhati High Court, and IFF has been impleaded in the case. IFF is now allowed to assist the Court with oral and written submissions in the proceedings.
